footer.aboutDescription: We are a specialized surgical center providing comprehensive medical services with state-of-the-art facilities.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our surgical services and procedures.
faq.contactPrompt: If you don't see your question here, please don't hesitate to contact us.

surgeryTypes.question: What types of surgeries do you perform?
surgeryTypes.answer: We offer a wide range of surgical procedures including cardiothoracic, neurosurgery, maxillofacial, general, pediatric, plastic and reconstructive surgery, and urological procedures.

consultation.question: How do I schedule a consultation?
consultation.answer: You can schedule a consultation by calling our center directly or filling out the contact form on our website. Our staff will get back to you within 24 hours.

insurance.question: Do you accept insurance?
insurance.answer: Yes, we work with most major insurance providers. Please contact our administrative staff for specific information about your insurance coverage.

beforeSurgery.question: What should I expect before surgery?
beforeSurgery.answer: Before surgery, you'll have a comprehensive consultation with your surgeon, receive detailed pre-operative instructions, and undergo necessary medical evaluations to ensure you're ready for the procedure.

postCare.question: What post-operative care do you provide?
postCare.answer: We provide comprehensive post-operative care including regular follow-up visits, rehabilitation services when needed, and 24/7 emergency support for our patients.
